overview: Get ready to power-vomit your intestines across the room as your brain melts to a steaming pulp of rot by the violent torrent of obscenity unleashed by the most insanity-inducing video mixtape you will ever lay eyes on.
tagline: "... an astonishingly audio-visual meltdown, farted from the filthy anus of the video revolution!"
title: Retard-O-Tron Video Mixtape Vol. 1
